##Classification tree
```{r}
library(tree)
library(gclus)
#attach(movies)
data(New_MovieDS)
set.seed(12412)
New_MovieDS$Genre <- factor(New_MovieDS$Genre)
bod <- data.frame(New_MovieDS)
bocl <- tree(Genre~ Rank+Runtime..Minutes.+Rating+Votes+Revenue..Millions.+Metascore , data=bod)
plot(bocl)
text(bocl)
```

##Pruning
```{r}
cv.bocl <- cv.tree(bocl, FUN = prune.misclass)
plot(cv.bocl, type="b")
```

## Minimum is at 8
```{r}
p.bocl <- prune.misclass(bocl, best=8)
plot(p.bocl)
text(p.bocl)
summary(p.bocl)
```
